name: [MEDIUM] CSP: Wildcard Directive
statusMessage:
Alert: CSP: Wildcard Directive
Risk: Medium (3 confidence)
Instances: 2
CWE: 693
Description: Content Security Policy (CSP) is an added layer of security that helps to detect and mitigate certain types of attacks. Including (but not limited to) Cross Site Scripting (XSS), and data injection attacks. These attacks are used for everything from data theft to site defacement or distribution of malware. CSP provides a set of standard HTTP headers that allow website owners to declare approved sources of content that browsers should be allowed to load on that page â€” covered types are JavaScript
Solution: Ensure that your web server, application server, load balancer, etc. is properly configured to set the Content-Security-Policy header.
